page.title: 17THE BRAUNSTONE COMMUNITY
page.content: The Wycliffe Community College was established in 1983,incorporating the original Braunstone Education Project. The main objective of the College is to enable the people of Braunstone and surrounding area to obtain the maximum benefit from the social,cultural,educational and recreational opportunities which can be provided. As well as the College buildings there are various outreach buildings such as a coffee bar,adult literacy mobile,youth wing,and various community centres. It is the policy of the staff to take time to care for the individual as well as the group whatever their age. The affairs of the College are directed by a Council which includes representatives from the College staff ,local groups and governors.
